body: Oops, that was a rebase mistake! I swear I ran tests locally, I'm not sure why it didn't fail here.

body:
Oh, this test only runs on nightly and I was using stable cargo to run `cargo test` locally:
https://github.com/rust-lang/cargo/pull/6164/commits/20920c01315003e5bc34ff0ca41d55a44e6ec07e#diff-2cbe411b955101d5ff2d27d7a2b63503R571
